title: Prologue to His Royal Highness, upon his first appearance at the Duke's Theatre since his return from Scotland. Written by Mr. Dryden. Spoken by Mr. Smith
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
publisher: printed for J. Tonson, at the Judge's Head in Chancery-lane,
notes: Verse - "In those cold regions which no summers chear,".
A variant of the edition lacking publisher's address and publication date in imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
